text:
A conditional logic controller is needed to allow for decision making at 
runtime based on regex result data stored in variables.
creator: geoffrey@4thpass.com

text:
A simple If comtroller has already been added to CVS (see bug  22937), and 
there are some plans to produce more sophisticated versions.
creator: tjsb@slb.com

text:
The combination of the Regexp Extractor, the If Controller, and the __javascript
function should fulfil this requirement.

Unfortunately, the IF controller doesn't seem to be able to use
dynamically-computed variables -- this seems to be true for all controllers:
variable replacement only happens once per test run.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com

text: Fixed in CVS and working OK
creator: sebb@apache.org
